item.description:
To get you ready for Saturday's book discussion of The Grapes of Wrath, we will watch the John Ford film adaptation on Friday, August 26, at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike, Hamden.

We will start with a pot-luck supper at 6:30 p.m. and begin the movie at 7:00 p.m.

If you plan to skip the book and only watch the film, please do yourself a favor and, at the very least, read the last chapter. Although John Ford’s 1940 film adaptation is a masterpiece that you’ll find on most top 100 all time film lists, the prevailing standards didn’t permit him to include what many consider to be the most powerful endings to a novel ever written.
item.name: Potluck and Movie: The Grapes of Wrath
